title: Collaborative Grammar Learning Course Based on the ARCS Model

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic grammatical structures and experience with digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Establishing collaborative learning environments through personal device utilization, project-based assessment systems, and cyber interactions

learning_goals: Learners can apply grammar concepts with over 85% accuracy through learning activities utilizing the four ARCS model elements (Attention, Relevance, Confidence, Satisfaction).
Learners can reduce grammar errors by over 50% through peer assessment and feedback on an online collaborative learning platform.
Learners can accurately analyze complex grammatical structures by context through more than three project-based assessments.

resources: Real-Time Collaboration Tools (Google Docs, Padlet, etc.)
Grammar Error Analysis AI Feedback System

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
